Articles.Content:
Whenever I try to launch KSP it starts to load  and then I get a Unity crash error.

It is a fresh install, I recently replaced my hard drive with a solid state drive and re-installed windows and all other programs.

Kerbal Space Program - 1.12.4.3187 (WindowsPlayer x64) en-us


OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0) 64bit
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3630QM CPU @ 2.40GHz (8)
RAM: 8048
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M   (1990MB)
SM: 50 (Direct3D 11.0 [level 11.0])
RT Formats: ARGB32, Depth, ARGBHalf, Shadowmap, RGB565, ARGB4444, ARGB1555, Default, ARGB2101010, DefaultHDR, ARGB64, ARGBFloat, RGFloat, RGHalf, RFloat, RHalf, R8, ARGBInt, RGInt, RInt, BGRA32, RGB111110Float, RG32, RGBAUShort, RG16, BGRA10101010_XR, BGR101010_XR, R16

 

error.txt: KSP Error - Pastebin.com

player.txt: KSP player.txt - Pastebin.com

 

Thanks in advance!

Edited December 24, 2022 by PyRexext
added fresh install notation.
